text: Simbach am Inn () is a town on the river Inn in Rottal-Inn in Bavaria, Germany. Braunau am Inn is on the opposite side of the river from Simbach. ==Geography== ===Schellenberg=== Schellenberg is a hill north of town. At over 549 meters in height, it is the tallest hill between the Inn and Rott. The hill gives views of the Inn valley, bordering Upper Austria, and (on clear days) the Alps. ==Twin towns and cities== Simbach am Inn is twinned with: * Skipton, England * Tolmezzo, Italy ==References== Category:Rottal-Inn
title: Simbach am Inn
